subject: RE: [junit] Code is fast with JUnit but rediculously slow when run through its own main
msgSnippet: Yes, I could expand but it s rather specific to the app we re working on. The fact was that a component (that should have been inactive) was continuously
messageBody:
Yes, I could expand but it's rather specific to the app we're working on.

The fact was that a component (that should have been inactive) was
continuously firing events to a TaskRunner queue on a TaskRunner that was
turned off.

In short, a fragile design issue within our application and NOT at all a
junit problem.

Morten
